info.name: MPGH Dark v0.02
info.description:
MPGH Forum on default has a complete white color scheme which can be hard on your eyes at night.
I decided to attempt a dark theme to fix that! :)
NOTE: I am a beginner in creating styles and css experience in general. This is actually my first style, please feel free to let me know anything I might have missed or any other suggestions.
info.additionalInfo:
Version List:

v0.01
Initial Release - August 26, 2017
v0.02
Notes - Fixed & Darkened user profile areas
